author: aGood_Nicknam3
description: The module starts with all the dials being on "A". The dials when pressed on the top (or bottom) should "scroll" up or down in the direction needed. When the submit button is pressed, the dials could speed up to then put the password as "SOLVED". The code could also be erased for Souvenir support. (What was the third letter's color?, What was the plaintext code?, What was the 4th letter?)
name: The Vigenère Cipher
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
